A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst Star Wars movie ever made. Blatantly pays zero hommage to the lore. They just make things up and contradict hard truths from every other movie and show made in Star Wars previously. Honestly\, Kathleen Kennedy and Rian Johnson made this movie feel like a bland 1990s low budget space movie rather than a Star Wars movie. They didn't even have a moment where luke and leia meet and rejoice.
